name: Writing Structure Planner Rubric
description: Evaluation criteria for structure planning quality

criteria.name: Material Analysis Depth
criteria.description: How thoroughly the material was analyzed before structuring

scores.1: No material analysis; structure imposed without understanding content
scores.2: Superficial analysis; misses major themes or key material
scores.3: Adequate analysis; captures main points but misses nuances
scores.4: Thorough analysis; identifies themes, patterns, and organizing principles
scores.5: Comprehensive analysis; all material catalogued with themes, priorities, and reader considerations

criteria.name: Structure Options Explored
criteria.description: Whether multiple structural options were considered and compared

scores.1: Only one structure considered with no alternatives
scores.2: Two options considered but comparison is shallow
scores.3: Three options sketched with basic pros/cons
scores.4: Three options with detailed comparison and clear recommendation
scores.5: Three or more options with diagrams, material mapping, and criteria-based selection

criteria.name: Structure-Material Fit
criteria.description: How well the chosen structure serves the specific content

scores.1: Structure clearly wrong for the material; forced and unnatural
scores.2: Structure somewhat fits but creates awkward flow or buried key points
scores.3: Structure adequate; works but another option might serve better
scores.4: Structure fits well; material flows naturally with good momentum
scores.5: Structure feels inevitable; perfectly serves the content and creates natural flow

criteria.name: Gold-Coin Placement
criteria.description: Strategic distribution of reader rewards throughout the structure

scores.2: Gold coins clustered at beginning only; saggy middle
scores.3: Some distribution but middle section still lacks engagement
scores.4: Good distribution throughout with attention to middle sections
scores.5: Strategic placement at opening, throughout middle, and conclusion with specific moments identified

criteria.name: Diagram Clarity and Usefulness
criteria.description: Whether the final structure diagram is clear and actionable for drafting

scores.2: Vague outline with no transitions or pacing notes
scores.3: Basic diagram with sections identified but lacking detail
scores.4: Clear diagram with transitions, pacing notes, and key moments marked
scores.5: Comprehensive annotated diagram with transitions, gold-coins, pacing, and through-line verified

passing_note: Average score must be >= 3.5 for structure plan to be considered complete. Scores below 3 in 'Structure-Material Fit' require revision.
